channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Brawl Taking Shape Over Pfizer's Multibillion-Dollar Heart Monopoly
item.description: The drugmaker’s fastest-growing blockbuster could soon face competition from two biotech firms in the treatment of a little-known heart condition.

item.title: A stock-market ‘Harris trade’ is starting to take shape
item.description: The unwinding of several “Trump trades” grabbed investors’ attention early Wednesday. But by the time Wall Street closed, a fledgling “Harris trade” h...

item.title: Falling Interest Rates May Be a Challenge for JPMorgan but Not for Everyone
item.description: Some banks may still see rising net interest income even if the Federal Reserve slashes rates as anticipated.

item.title: ‘He has never paid rent or utilities:’ Do I have the legal and moral authority to charge my brother rent to live in our family home?
item.description: ‘My brother has been living there while my father was alive — and still is. He did not pay any rent or utilities’

item.title: Megamerger of European Banks Still Wouldn't Challenge Wall Street
item.description: A potential combination of Italy’s UniCredit with Germany’s Commerzbank would be big, but not big enough to create a European banking champion.

item.title: GM and Hyundai to explore cooperating on vehicles, supply chain and clean-energy technology
item.description: General Motors Co. and Hyundai Motor Co. said Thursday they have signed a memorandum of understanding to explore collaboration on vehicles, supply cha...

item.title: Investors Adopt Defensive Crouch Ahead of Fed Rate Cut
item.description: The utilities sector is neck and neck with tech as 2024’s best performing group.

item.title: Olsen twins fashion brand The Row gets funding from Chanel and L’Oréal owners: report
item.description: The billionaire Wertheimer brothers and L’Oreal heiress Francoise Bettencourt have invested in Mary-Kate and Ashley Olsen’s fashion brand The Row, in ...

item.title: Private Markets Seem Out of Reach for Individual Investors. BlackRock Thinks It Has an Answer.
item.description: The asset manager is teaming up with Partners Group to offer wealthy investors a preset portfolio.

item.title: AST SpaceMobile successfully launches first five commercial satellites
item.description: Space-based broadband company AST SpaceMobile launched its first five commercial satellites into space atop a SpaceX Falcon 9 rocket early Thursday.
